Rowdy Wolf:









Rowdy Wolf watched Zyber at the corner of his eye. "Appearances mean nothing 
to me." He watched the outside of his cave, and sniffed the air. "I'm going 
to check something out." he announced to her. "Something's out there. 
Something I hadn't smelt before." He withdrew his rifle from behind his 
back, and held it by his thigh. He walked out of the mouth of the cave and 
held it, aiming at the air in front of him. He growled with his eyes glowing 
yellow.
